gr::VertexFormat Class Reference
[Graphics rendering library]

#include <VertexFormat.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Describes vertex bit layout.


Public Types

enum  { MAX_TEXCOORDS = 4 }
enum  DataFormat {
  DF_NONE, DF_S_32, DF_S_16, DF_S_8,

  DF_V4_8, DF_V4_5, DF_SIZE
}

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
 

Enumeration values:
MAX_TEXCOORDS  Maximum number of texture coordinate layers.

enum gr::VertexFormat::DataFormat
 

Format of a data component.

Enumeration values:
DF_NONE  Null vertex data format.
DF_S_32  Single 32-bit float.
DF_S_16  Single 16-bit integer.
DF_S_8  Single 8-bit integer.
DF_V2_32  32-bit float 2-vector.
DF_V2_16  16-bit integer 2-vector.
DF_V2_8  8-bit integer 2-vector.
DF_V3_32  32-bit float 3-vector.
DF_V3_16  16-bit integer 3-vector.
DF_V3_8  8-bit integer 3-vector.
DF_V4_32  32-bit float 4-vector.
DF_V4_16  16-bit integer 4-vector.
DF_V4_8  8-bit integer 4-vector.
DF_V4_5  5-bit integer 4-vector.
DF_SIZE  Number of different vertex data formats.

enum gr::VertexFormat::DataType
 

Semantic type of a data component.

Enumeration values:
DT_POSITION  Vertex has model space position data.
DT_POSITIONT  Vertex has screen space position data.
DT_BONEWEIGHTS  Vertex has bone weights used in skinning.
DT_BONEINDICES  Vertex has bone indices used in skinning.
DT_NORMAL  Vertex has normal pointing away from surface.
DT_DIFFUSE  Vertex has diffuse color data.
DT_SPECULAR  Vertex has specular color data.
DT_TEX0  Vertex has texture layer 0.
DT_TEX1  Vertex has texture layer 1.
DT_TEX2  Vertex has texture layer 2.
DT_TEX3  Vertex has texture layer 3.
DT_TANGENT  Vertex has tangent data.
DT_SIZE  Number of different vertex component types.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gr::VertexFormat::VertexFormat (   ) 
 

Empty vertex format description.

VertexFormat& gr::VertexFormat::addWeights (  DataFormat  weightdf,
DataFormat  indexdf
) 
 

Sets vertex weight information to the model vertex format.

Number of vertex weights is one less than the number of affecting bones per vertex. (the last vertex weights is implicitly defined by the other weights)

Parameters:
weightdf Data format of weights per vertex.
indexdf Data format of bone indices per vertex.

const math::float4 &  sscale,

)  [static]
 

Copies data from one vertex format to another.

void gr::VertexFormat::getData (  DataFormat  df,
const void *  data,
math::float4 *  out
)  [static]
 

Returns data from specified format.

If the data format does not have specified components, 0 is returned in that 4-vector component instead.

int gr::VertexFormat::getDataDim (  DataFormat  df  )  [static]
 

Returns data dimensions (in number of components) of specified data format.

DataFormat gr::VertexFormat::getDataFormat (  DataType  dt  )  const
 

Returns format of specified semantic type.

Returns:
DF_NONE if format of specified type is not set.

int gr::VertexFormat::getDataSize (  DataFormat  df,
int  n
)  [static]
 

Returns data size (in bytes) of specified data format and n vertices.

Data size is aligned to 32-bit boundary.

int gr::VertexFormat::getDataSize (  DataFormat  df  )  [static]
 

Returns data size (in bytes) of specified data format.

DataFormat gr::VertexFormat::getTextureCoordinateFormat (  int  layer  )  const
 

Returns texture coordinate layer format.

const char* gr::VertexFormat::toString (  DataFormat  df  )  [static]
 

Converts data format to string.

lang::String gr::VertexFormat::toString (   )  const
 

Returns string representation of this format.

Format is returned as "(TYPE1=FORMAT1, TYPE2=FORMAT2, ..., TYPEN=FORMATN)".

int gr::VertexFormat::vertexSize (   )  const
 

Returns size of single vertex in bytes, ignoring padding and platform specific considerations.
